REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0813 reute b f BC-/K-MART-<KM>-MARCH-SA 04-09 0072

TEXT.TITLE: K MART <KM> MARCH SALES SHOW INCREASE
TEXT.BODY: K mart Corp said its sales for the five weeks ended April One rose 4.6 pct to 2.18 billion dlrs from 2.08 billion dlrs a year earlier. On a comparable store basis, sales rose one-tenth of one pct. It said year-to-date sales increased 7.9 pct to 3.64 billion dlrs from 3.37 billion dlrs in the same 1986 period. On a comparable store basis, the increase was 3.2 pct. Reuter
